panel.label: Chat/IM
panel.name: Chat/IM

check_box.label: Announce incoming instant messages
check_box.tool_tip: Opens an IM window when someone starts typing an IM to you. This gives you a heads up that someone is IMing you before they hit enter.
check_box.name: quickstart_im_check

check_box.label: Don't send '[name] is typing...' in IMs
check_box.tool_tip: IM partners will not see '______ is typing...' when you're responding.
check_box.name: hide_typing_check

check_box.label: Show group name in chat
check_box.tool_tip: The name of the group will also be displayed if the IM is from group chat.
check_box.name: append_group_name_check

check_box.label: Play the typing sound for local chat
check_box.tool_tip: Silences the chatting type sound, making it quieter for things like performances.
check_box.name: play_typing_sound_check

check_box.label: Do not echo/log notifications in chat
check_box.name: hide_notifications_in_chat_check

check_box.label: Allow MU pose method.
check_box.tool_tip: Allows the use of both /me and : to perform emotes.
check_box.name: allow_mu_pose_check

check_box.label: Auto-close OOC comments.
check_box.tool_tip: Will automatically append '))' to any message starting with '((', or visa versa.
check_box.name: close_ooc_check

panel.text: Show links on chatting object names in chat history for:

radio_group.tool_tip: Enables a link to show you the owner of the speaking object.
radio_group.name: objects_link

combo_box.tool_tip: Show hours in either 12-23 or 12PM-11PM format.
combo_box.name: time_format_combobox

check_box.label: Enable Autoresponse
check_box.name: AscentInstantMessageResponseAnyone
check_box.tool_tip: Sends a pre made message of your choosing, when people start IMing you. (Enter your message in the Response Text. Text area), located below.

check_box.label: Autorespond to non-friends
check_box.name: AscentInstantMessageResponseFriends
check_box.tool_tip: Sends a pre made message of your choosing, when people start IMing you. (Enter your message in the Response Text. Text area), located below.

check_box.label: Autorespond to people you have muted
check_box.name: AscentInstantMessageResponseMuted
check_box.tool_tip: Sends a pre made message of your choosing, when people start IMing you. (Enter your message in the Response Text. Text area), located below.

check_box.label: Send as soon as they start typing
check_box.name: AscentInstantMessageShowOnTyping

check_box.label: Don't show IMs you auto-responsed to
check_box.name: AscentInstantMessageShowResponded

check_box.label: Send an item along with the response
check_box.name: AscentInstantMessageResponseItem
check_box.tool_tip: You can include an inventory item to send along with your auto response by dragging it from your inventory to the location below

panel.text: #f for user's first name, #l for last name, #t for timestamp, #r for SLURL to you, #i for your idle time. (e.g. "5 mins")
